pages.text: $(li)Glowstone Dust is a essencial ingredient for Potions.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to upgrade normal potions to Level II in a Brewing Stand.$(br)$(li)Witches rarely drop Glowstone Dust on death.
$(br)$(li)You can obtain Glowstone Dust breaking Glowstone blocks too.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft multiple items in a Crafting Table.

pages.title: Crafts
pages.text: $(li)Glowstone$(li)Paper Lantern$(li)Dimstone$(li)Elightened Bushes$(li)GLowballs$(li)Glimmer Gravel$(li)Spectral Arrows$(li)Glowing Glass Item Frames$(li)Photometer$(li)Antiblock$(li)Shimmer Sand$(li)Glowstone Armor
